title: Movement exploration
brief_description: Shows the techniques of movement exploration, demonstrating locomotor activities, ball handling, spatial awareness, uses for hula hoops, jump ropes, apparatus stations, and a technique for use with limited apparatus.
description: Shows the techniques of movement exploration, demonstrating locomotor activities, ball handling, spatial awareness, uses for hula hoops, jump ropes, apparatus stations, and a technique for use with limited apparatus.
